entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Eskasoni
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:24 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Eskasoni (First Nations) 5:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 9.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 8.8°C
Wind: SW 26 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches dissipating before morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
